entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 12:08 AM CDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:08 AM CDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow with risk of freezing rain. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 12:08 AM CDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
